question: Which city is the venue of first ‘National Conference on Coastal Disaster Risk Reduction and Resilience (CDRR&R) – 2020’ ?
explanation: The first ‘National Conference on Coastal Disaster Risk Reduction and Resilience (CDRR&R) – 2020’ was organized by the National Institute of Disaster Management (NIDM), in New Delhi on February 25, 2020.
